title: Paragliding in Lima - Costa Verde
description: Soar through the skies above Peru’s capital on this 15-minute paragliding adventure. Glide through the air with your instructor and see the districts of Magdalena, San Isidro, Miraflores, and San Miguel which make up the Green Coast of Lima. The flight lasts between 10 and 15 minutes and all guests receive an SD memory card with a full HD video of their flight to share with family and friends.
all_descriptions: Soar through the skies above Peru’s capital on this 15-minute paragliding adventure. Glide through the air with your instructor and see the districts of Magdalena, San Isidro, Miraflores, and San Miguel which make up the Green Coast of Lima. The flight lasts between 10 and 15 minutes and all guests receive an SD memory card with a full HD video of their flight to share with family and friends.

Ideal for travelers who’re short on time but looking to see Lima’s Costa Verde beaches, this Lima paragliding experience is a must-book. Once you get to the meeting spot in Magdalena del Mar, check in and get suited up with your provided helmet. 

Then, enjoy a short introduction with your instructor before you set off in the air with them.

Soar above Magdalena, San Isidro, Miraflores, and San Miguel, taking in the stunning views from high in the sky. 

After your flight gets back to land, get an HD video of your flight on an SD memory card to remember your experience by.
Condor Xtreme - Paragliding Miraflores, Circuito de Playas, Magdalena del Mar 15086, Peru
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider:
Google. Google disclaims all warranties, express or implied, with respect to translations, including any warranties of accuracy, reliability, and any implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and freedom from forgery.
Rosita K
4 contributions

Flight experience top, organization flop

The organization before the flight was a bit chaotic. ES nothing was explained, everything happened very quickly. The equipment was simply put on without knowing exactly what was happening. There was no introduction or short ES conversation, the pilot did not even introduce himself. He was already sitting in the paraglider waiting while you were still trying to find your way around. Communication was mostly hands and feet, which created uncertainty. Unfortunately, the video of the flight was not recorded, although ES was announced.
However, the flight itself was beautiful, the experience in the air and the view were impressive.
Automatically translated
Written August 7, 2025

Wilmington, NC10 contributions

Thrill Of A Lifetime!!! A GREAT Way to Experience Lima!

I recently went trykeparagliding over Lima while in Peru. This experience was adrenaline-filled and just plain AMAZING! The company was extremely responsive and booked me for the next day. There is a convenient pick-up point in Mira Flores as the site is about 25 minutes away. The staff was very efficient. This is a thrill you'll never forget! Plus a day later you'll receive a great video of you in flight!
Written April 19, 2025

Sarah H
1 contribution

Skip it.

Apr 2025 • Family
Such a frustrating experience! I would strongly recommend not using this company. They will waste a large chunk of your day and act like they have no idea why you are annoyed. when we showed up, they told us 30-40 minutes…there were 5 people (2 groups) waiting- and 3 machines going, so I thought that sounded reasonable- but two hours later we were still waiting. Random people kept showing up and cutting in front of us. When I spoke to one person about it, he first told me that he was sorry- but they had made a reservations the day before. When I asked again- his boss cane over and claimed that they had gotten in line but had gone to the bathroom. I am not sure which version was the truth- but they most definitely were not there before us. We literally watched them drive up in a van and cut in front of us. It was beyond infuriating to be sitting outside in the blazing hot sun for hours waiting while people who spoke better spanish cut in front of us.

In addition, the location is not nice and convenient at all to Miraflores. You have to go all the way down to the shore (meaning you have to hike back up when you are done). Also- that particular part of the shore is quite polluted and not safe for swimming or enjoying the ocean.

Ironically- despite the fact that I had made it very clear that I was dissatisfied with the experience, as I left- the main guy asked me to make sure and give them a review on trip advisor.

So. Yeah. My review: Skip this place and all of its headaches and go somewhere more respectable.
Written April 13, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

I flew in at 7pm, I couldn't see anything. Bad experience

Feb 2025 • Solo
Unfortunately, I didn't have a good experience. For them, it is more important to sell and make money than people’s experience.

They offered to fly at 5 p.m. (even when I asked if there would be good visibility at that time, they said yes). We were picked up by car, and when we arrived to fly at that time, a lot of people also arrived, about 15 people. They left me for last and I had to wait two hours, almost until 7 p.m.

It was very cold (because I didn't know I would have to wait that long). After sunset, I told them I wanted to fly when there was still light so I could see the city, mountains and parks, but they assured me that I could still see everything (rather than offering to go another day).

When I finally flew, it was too dark. In the video you can not see anything, and when I returned I told them this, but they did not offer me any solution. They just said that one of the four cars had been damaged and that's why there was so much row. But that's not my fault.

When I wrote to them on WhatsApp afterwards, they ignored me. I wasn't offered to fly again or a discount. They offered nothing, they just replied: “I understand.” And now they spam me almost every day, telling me that if I leave a comment on Google, they can edit a photo with my “best moments.” What pictures, if the video is all dark and I can't even see myself in it?

And it's not paragliding. Paragliding has no engine.
Automatically translated
Written March 3, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
